draw2d(proportional_axes=xy,
explicit( 6.990000 + -16.666667 * (x - 5.420000) + 0.000000 * ((x - 5.420000)^2) + -22083.333333 * ((x-5.420000)^3),x,5.420000,5.440000), 
explicit( 6.480000 + -43.166667 * (x - 5.440000) + -1325.000000 * ((x - 5.440000)^2) + 44166.666667 * ((x-5.440000)^3),x,5.440000,5.450000)
);
